subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: The Australian Marinko Matosevic gave a shout-out to the six-time N.B.A. champion Michael Jordan before he was drowned out by Roger Federer, a 17-time Grand Slam winner.
snippet: The Australian Marinko Matosevic gave a shout-out to the six-time N.B.A. champion Michael Jordan before he was drowned out by Roger Federer, a 17-time Grand Slam winner.
